description:
Kohina is haunted by the raccoon dog Shigaraki. The Ichimatsu Family is pushed around and thrown into chaos by the liquor, cigarette, woman, and gambling-loving Shigaraki.
Shigaraki steals Kokkuri-san`s precious savings and heads to an unexpected location!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le type qui l’intéresse vient de la science-fiction !
The One on My Mind Is into Sci-Fi!
